column5: It,s been steady all morning since 7am. Loving it.Â  Well needed.
Oh ya, the grass is already turning green, long overdue.
Lake levels were too low as well. Hope the lake goes up an inch or two.
Why I have not been up yet Jer. I hate bath water.

friggin getting scary as hell up near the key river this weekend. I was not enjoying the smoke and haze in Pointe Au Baril all weekend, and then to top it off, people are lighting fireworks. I friggin wish i could have seen where they were coming from, I woulda had the OPP and bylaw enforcement all over them.  Can you believe that though, you can literally see the smoke from the fire and then you think its smart to light fireworks.... man?
Can't fix stupid at the best of times.
i swear it surpasses stupid, and lies on a complete hopelessness for the human race its so extremely dimwitted
